summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Beskar IT website fixes. All backend APIs working correctly. All frontend features tested successfully including contact form, product modals, USPCF framework visibility, Privacy Policy and Terms pages, and navigation functionality.
passed_tests: Backend contact form validation works properly
Contact form submission shows success message with support@beskarit.com
Product cards are clickable and open detail modals
Modal can be closed with X button
USPCF framework is visible in Compliance section under 'Unified Framework' card
Privacy Policy page accessible via footer link
Terms of Service page accessible via footer link
Back to Home button works on Privacy/Terms pages
support@beskarit.com displayed in contact section and footer
All navigation links work correctly (Products, Services, Compliance, Impact, Contact)
